comments:
build I20040121

Due to some runtime problem, the CVS core plugins got disabled.
This caused the CVS decorator to fail.
However, there also seems to be an error in the decorator manager's exception 
handling.  See the assertion failed below.  Looks like it's passing a null 
message.

See the 
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Jan 28, 2004 11:53:41.545

in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
